column1: matters 'purely of academic nature' since such issues are best dealt with by
academics  who  are  fully  equipped  to  consider  the  questions
establishments  that  fall  under  the  category  stipulated  in  terms  of  Article
126, there are no provisions to restrain this Court from examining an alleged
violation relating to an infringement or imminent infringement irrespective of
the  fact  that  the  said  violation  is  in  relation  to  a  decision  of  an  academic
